SEARCH
Package gw.api.json.schema

Interface JsonSchemaDefinition

public interface JsonSchemaDefinition
A single type definition within a JSON Schema file.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    JsonSchemaProperty
    getDefaultProperty()
    Returns the JsonSchemaProperty based on the "additionalProperties" property of the schema definition, or null if the schema definition does not define the "additionalProperties" property.
    @NotNull Map<String,Object>
    getExtensions()
    The x-gw-extensions for the definition.
    @NotNull String
    getFullyQualifiedName()
    Returns the fully-qualified name of this schema definition, so it can be identified unambiguously.
    @NotNull String
    getName()
    Returns the name of this schema definition, i.e. the key within the "definitions" object in the schema file
    @NotNull Map<String,? extends JsonSchemaProperty>
    getNamedProperties()
    Returns a Map of JsonSchemaPropertys explicitly defined on this schema definition, keyed by property name.
    JsonSchemaProperty
    getPropertyOrDefault(String name)
    If this schema definition defines a property with the given name, returns that property.
    @NotNull Set<String>
    getRequiredPropertyNames()
    Returns the names of the required properties for this schema definition.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      @NotNull @NotNull String getName()
      Returns the name of this schema definition, i.e. the key within the "definitions" object in the schema file
      Returns:
      the name of this schema definition

    • getFullyQualifiedName

      @NotNull @NotNull String getFullyQualifiedName()
      Returns the fully-qualified name of this schema definition, so it can be identified unambiguously. The name will be of the form <schema-name>-<schema-version>#/definitions/<definition-name>
      Returns:
      the fully-qualified name of this schema definition

    • getNamedProperties

      @NotNull @NotNull Map<String,? extends JsonSchemaProperty> getNamedProperties()
      Returns a Map of JsonSchemaPropertys explicitly defined on this schema definition, keyed by property name.
      Returns:
      a Map of JsonSchemaPropertys explicitly defined on this schema definition

    • getDefaultProperty

      JsonSchemaProperty getDefaultProperty()
      Returns the JsonSchemaProperty based on the "additionalProperties" property of the schema definition, or null if the schema definition does not define the "additionalProperties" property.
      Returns:
      the JsonSchemaProperty based on the "additionalProperties" property of the schema definition, or null if the schema definition does not define the "additionalProperties" property.

    • getPropertyOrDefault

      JsonSchemaProperty getPropertyOrDefault(String name)
      If this schema definition defines a property with the given name, returns that property. Otherwise, if this schema definition defines "additionalProperties", this will return the definition for additional properties on this schema. Otherwise returns null.

      Equivalent to calling (getNamedProperties().containsKey(name) ? getNamedProperties().get(name) : getDefaultProperty())

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the property to retrieve
      Returns:
      either an explicitly named property, the default property, or null

    • getRequiredPropertyNames

      @NotNull @NotNull Set<String> getRequiredPropertyNames()
      Returns the names of the required properties for this schema definition. This Set may be empty.
      Returns:
      the names of the required properties for this schema definition

    • getExtensions

      @NotNull @NotNull Map<String,Object> getExtensions()
      The x-gw-extensions for the definition. This will always return a non-null value, though it may be empty. Values in the returned map may be null, and the map itself is immutable.
      Returns:
      the x-gw-extensions for the definition
